div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1776 Mesopotamia, 1953 Burial: c. 145 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 5+ AR Antiochus IV: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Alexander I Bala: 4 tetradr. (Antiocheia 2 of S.E. 163 and 166, Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 1, unc. 1) Disposition: dispersed Information from H. Seyrig
